pkgmetadata.longdescription: scrapy_warc===========.. contents:: **Table of Contents** :backlinks: noneInstallation------------scrapy_warc is distributed on `PyPI <https://pypi.org>`_ as a universalwheel and is available on Linux/macOS and Windows and supportsPython 2.7/3.5+ and PyPy... code-block:: bash $ pip install scrapy_warcLicense-------scrapy_warc is distributed under the terms of both- `MIT License <https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_- `Apache License, Version 2.0 <https://choosealicense.com/licenses/apache-2.0>`_at your option.
